meanings.definition: The exchange of goods or services for money.
meanings.sent1: Her sales at the lemonade stand were impressive.
meanings.sent2: The company's sales have been steadily increasing.
meanings.sent3: The sales of cookies were so high, they ran out of stock!
meanings.sent4: His sales pitch was so convincing, he sold ice to an Eskimo.
meanings.sent5: The booming sales made the business owner ecstatic.

meanings.definition: The act of selling goods or services.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys the process of making sales to customers.
meanings.sent2: His job involves making sales calls to potential clients.
meanings.sent3: The sales of the new product were so smooth, it felt like a dance.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sales, he was a master puppeteer pulling the strings.
meanings.sent5: The art of sales requires both skill and charisma.

meanings.definition: The total amount of goods or services sold in a given period.
meanings.sent1: The sales for the month exceeded all expectations.
meanings.sent2: The annual sales report showed a significant increase.
meanings.sent3: The sales of the year-end clearance were like a whirlwind.
meanings.sent4: The sales figures painted a picture of success for the company.
meanings.sent5: The record-breaking sales set a new benchmark in the industry.
